settings.text:
Revolutionary AI Voice Recorder for Professional
Interview Documentation
In today's media and research landscape, interview documentation faces persistent challenges:
Traditional recording devices produce poor audio quality with background noise interference, affecting transcription quality
Manual note-taking cannot keep up with interview pace, leading to missed key insights and brilliant quotes
Multi-language interviews create language barriers and real-time comprehension difficulties
Post-interview content organization isextremely time-consuming, impacting work efficiency
UMEVO Note Plus AI Voice Recorder I designed to address these pain points, making every interview professional and efficient is specifically.
Master Professional Interview Documentation in Three Steps
Magnetic AI Voice Recorder: HD Noise Reduction & Mobile AI Assistant

Compatible with Apple, Samsung, Google,
and other mainstream brands

Want to fully leverage the powerful features of UMEVO Note Plus? Follow our comprehensive setup and usage guide,

from basic configuration to advanced features, to become a meeting documentation expert.
• Download "AI DVR Link" from App Store or Google Play
• Create your app account for device management
• Long press Record button for 3 seconds until "Welcome" appears
• Open app and follow instructions to bind device
• CALL Mode: Toggle left for phone call recording
• Attach to phone back using magnetic case for calls
• Place on desk or hold in hand for meetings
• App Control: Use AI DVR Link app interface

Battery:400 mAh
Recording Time:40 hours
Standby Time:60 days
Storage:64 GB

settings.heading: What types of interviews is UMEVO Note Plus suitable for?

settings.text: UMEVO Note Plus is perfect for various interview scenarios including news interviews, academic research interviews, HR recruitment interviews, podcast recordings, market research interviews, and more. Whether it's one-on-one in-depth interviews or multi-person group interviews, it provides clear recording and accurate transcription for all professional interview needs.

settings.heading: How is recording quality guaranteed in noisy environments?

settings.text: The device features AI noise cancellation technology that effectively filters background noise while highlighting human voices. Even in environments with background sounds like cafes or offices, it ensures interview content remains clear and audible, maintaining high transcription accuracy levels.

settings.heading: How does it handle multi-language interviews?

settings.text: The system supports transcription and translation for 140 languages. For multi-language interviews, it automatically identifies languages and provides accurate transcription, along with real-time translation features to help break language barriers and ensure smooth interview proceedings.

settings.heading: How is interview data security ensured?

settings.text: The system employs end-to-end encryption technology to protect data security, supporting both local storage and cloud backup. Users can choose their preferred data storage method, and all transmission processes are encrypted to ensure interview content privacy and security.

settings.heading: What about battery life for long interviews?

settings.text: The 400mAh battery supports 40 hours of continuous recording with 60 days of standby time. Even for multi-hour in-depth interviews, there's no need to worry about battery life. The 64GB storage space can save numerous interview recordings, meeting all professional requirements.

What types of interviews is UMEVO Note Plus suitable for?

UMEVO Note Plus is perfect for various interview scenarios including news interviews, academic research interviews, HR recruitment interviews, podcast recordings, market research interviews, and more. Whether it's one-on-one in-depth interviews or multi-person group interviews, it provides clear recording and accurate transcription for all professional interview needs.
How is recording quality guaranteed in noisy environments?

The device features AI noise cancellation technology that effectively filters background noise while highlighting human voices. Even in environments with background sounds like cafes or offices, it ensures interview content remains clear and audible, maintaining high transcription accuracy levels.

The system supports transcription and translation for 140 languages. For multi-language interviews, it automatically identifies languages and provides accurate transcription, along with real-time translation features to help break language barriers and ensure smooth interview proceedings.

The system employs end-to-end encryption technology to protect data security, supporting both local storage and cloud backup. Users can choose their preferred data storage method, and all transmission processes are encrypted to ensure interview content privacy and security.
What about battery life for long interviews?

The 400mAh battery supports 40 hours of continuous recording with 60 days of standby time. Even for multi-hour in-depth interviews, there's no need to worry about battery life. The 64GB storage space can save numerous interview recordings, meeting all professional requirements.
